short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show icon on GitHub to copy commit hash to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Without this extension, you should select commit hash precisely and copy it. It is tedious and difficult to copy without unnecessary characters like space and new line.

If you use this extension, a magic clipboard icon appears in next to commit hash text. You can just click the icon to copy the commit hash to clipboard.
